question: Mr S K Shivakumar was an Indian scientist from Karnataka who was passed away in April 2019. He belongs to which organisation?
option3: Indian Institute of Science Education and Research
explanation: S. K. Shivakumar was an Indian scientist from Karnataka state who worked at the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) centres. He was awarded the Padma Shri, the fourth highest civilian award of India, in 2015.
